verses.name: Exodus 37:4
verses.text: And he made staves of shittim wood, and overlaid them with gold.

verses.name: Exodus 37:5
verses.text: And he put the staves into the rings by the sides of the ark, to bear the ark.

verses.name: Exodus 37:6
verses.text: And he made the mercy seat of pure gold: two cubits and a half was the length thereof, and one cubit and a half the breadth thereof.

verses.name: Exodus 37:7
verses.text: And he made two cherubims of gold, beaten out of one piece made he them, on the two ends of the mercy seat;
